	gs.warn("this is a warning message from the NeedIt App");

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-11-19 14:47:18</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>9d7e590107d351107cadf4be7c1ed046</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Business Rule Logging Demo</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_9d7e590107d351107cadf4be7c1ed046</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-11-19 14:47:18</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=9d7e590107d351107cadf4be7c1ed046"/></record_update>
